Sentencas: The effects of IB metal (Gold, Silver, and Copper) dopants at the triple phase boundary (TPB) on the resistance to sulfur poisoning of the Nickel/Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia (YSZ) with interface oxygen vacancy (denoted as Ni/YSZ-Ov) are studied using the first-principles method based on density functional theory.
Titulo: Resistance to sulfur poisoning of the gold doped nickel/yttria-stabilized zirconia with interface oxygen vacancy

Sentencas: Models with Au, Ag, Cu dopants at the TPB of Ni/YSZ-Ov are proposed.
Titulo: Resistance to sulfur poisoning of the gold doped nickel/yttria-stabilized zirconia with interface oxygen vacancy

Sentencas: It is found that the Au dopant prefers to be at the neighbor of the oxygen vacancy site (denoted as NiAu-d/YSZ-Ov) while the Ag, Cu dopants tend to be located at the top Ni layer, which have little effects on the sulfur adsorption at the interface oxygen vacancy site.
Titulo: Resistance to sulfur poisoning of the gold doped nickel/yttria-stabilized zirconia with interface oxygen vacancy

Sentencas: Compared with Ni/YSZ-Ov, the NiAu-d/YSZ-Ov can not only weaken the sulfur adsorption at the interface oxygen vacancy site, but also restrain the diffusion of sulfur to the interface oxygen vacancy.
Titulo: Resistance to sulfur poisoning of the gold doped nickel/yttria-stabilized zirconia with interface oxygen vacancy

Sentencas: Instead, the adsorbed S at the oxygen vacancy is more easily to diffuse out of the interface oxygen vacancy site.
Titulo: Resistance to sulfur poisoning of the gold doped nickel/yttria-stabilized zirconia with interface oxygen vacancy

Sentencas: So we propose that doping Au in Ni at the neighbor of the interface oxygen vacancy site would be good way to increase the resistance to sulfur poisoning of the Ni/YSZ-Ov anode.
Titulo: Resistance to sulfur poisoning of the gold doped nickel/yttria-stabilized zirconia with interface oxygen vacancy
